name: Aladino - Connecticut - Robusto
additionalNotes: The Aladino Connecticut is an alluring, light-brown stick that uses an Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper, and premium Honduran tobaccos for its binder and filler. A mildly pleasant cigar, the Aladino Connecticut is a perfect companion to a rich, warm cup of coffee. The Aladino Connecticut is hand crafted in the Jamastran Valley in Honduras at Las Lomas Factory, which is owned by Julio R. Eiroa and his son Justo who also owns the JRE Tobacco Company.Â
